messages.prophecy: Arr, the ancient clickin' prophecy starts to unfold, ye scurvy dog!
messages.cosmic: Shiver me timbers, the cosmic clickin' crew be proud of yer progress!
messages.astral: The clickin' echoes through the seven seas of the astral plane...
messages.speaking: Blimey! Did ye hear that? The clicks be speakin' to me...
messages.ancient: Yer clickin' resonates with the power of Davy Jones himself!
messages.sages: The Click Sages whisper tales of yer potential, ye swab...
messages.demons: BEHOLD! The Click Demons rise from the briny deep!
messages.veil: Yer clicks pierce the veil like a cutlass through sail!
messages.spirits: The Click Spirits dance a jolly sailor's jig to yer rhythm...
messages.council: The Grand Click Council of Pirates has noticed yer dedication
messages.primordial: Yer clickin' awakens forces from the bottom of the sea!
messages.void: The clickin' void stares back at ye like a hungry kraken...
messages.runes: Ancient pirate click runes glow with yer power!
messages.beast: THREE THREE THREE - THE NUMBER OF THE CLICK BEAST, YE SCALLYWAG
messages.prophets: The Click Prophets sing shanties of yer coming!
messages.dimensions: Yer clicks echo through the seven dimensional seas...
messages.portal: Yer clicks have opened a portal to Tortuga!
messages.sacrifice: The ancient Click Gods demand MORE PLUNDER
messages.jackpot: TREASURE FOUND! The Click Casino welcomes its newest buccaneer!
messages.unmatched: 你的点击力量无人能及! (Yer clickin' power be unmatched, ye sea dog!)
messages.reality: Reality itself bends to yer clickin' like a ship in a storm!
messages.elite: YE BE THE ELITE CLICK CAPTAIN NOW
messages.power: Yer clickin' power level be over 1500 doubloons!
messages.devils: The Click Devils bow before yer mighty cutlass
messages.lucky: Lucky clicks flow through yer veins like rum
messages.dynasty: The Click Dynasty recognizes ye as the Pirate King
messages.twoThousand: Two thousand clicks of pure pirate power!
messages.quartet: The prophecy of the Click Shanty Quartet be fulfilled
messages.transcend: Yer clickin' transcends mortal understanding, by thunder!
messages.constellation: The Click Stars align to guide yer ship
messages.destiny: THREE THOUSAND CLICKS OF PIRATE DESTINY
messages.fortune: Fortune favors the bold clicker of the seas
messages.newDimensions: Yer clickin' power reaches new oceans
messages.quartet2: The Quadruple Click Shanty crew harmonizes
messages.threshold: Standing at the helm of click divinity
messages.ultimate: FIVE THOUSAND CLICKS OF ULTIMATE PIRATE POWER!
messages.force: The Five Fingered Click Force be yours to command
messages.underworld: The Click Underworld crowns ye their Pirate King
messages.infinite: 无限点击力量! (INFINITE PIRATE CLICKING POWER!)
messages.godhood: YE HAVE ASCENDED TO CLICK PIRATE GODHOOD

achievements.title: Treasures
achievements.noAchievements: No booty plundered yet. Keep clickin', ye scurvy dog!
achievements.chaosHare: 🌪️ Storm Bringer of the Seven Seas
achievements.carrotCultist: ⛪ High Priest of Davy Jones' Locker

reset.confirm: Arr ye sure ye want to scuttle all yer progress? There be no gettin' it back once it's gone to Davy Jones' locker!
